parameter.name: photoUrl
parameter.description: The URL of a photo that is already uploaded to the Internet.

parameter.name: vaultImageId
parameter.description: A vault image ID to use for a photo.

parameter.name: place
parameter.description: Page ID of a place associated with the photo

parameter.name: targeting
parameter.description: Allows you to target posts to specific audiences.

parameter.name: feedTargeting
parameter.description: Object that controls news feed targeting for this post.

parameter.name: noStory
parameter.description: If set to true, this will suppress feed and timeline story.

parameter.name: published
parameter.description: Set to false if you don't want the photo to be published immediately

parameter.name: attempt
parameter.description: Number of attempts that have been made to upload this photo

parameter.name: backdatedTime
parameter.description: A user-specified creation time for this photo

parameter.name: scheduledPublishTime
parameter.description: Time at which an unpublished post should be published.

parameter.name: unpublishedContentType
parameter.description: Type of unpublished content, such as scheduled, draft or ads_post.
